body:
Hey canuck_pro here. So I thought of an idea of battle classes. For example, you have infantry men on the front lines, fighting the crap out of others, and at the same time trying to eat as many gaps as you can. Then there could be the sniper/hawk-eye class, whose purpose is to peg the crap out of people from every corner, with arrows. Finally, there could be the armoury specialists. Their job is to make all the TNT and red stone contraptions, needed to make a successful victory for your team.
Did you guys find this interesting? Any other cool classes? Idk, maybe the camper class, or the AFK class. 

:D
